Title: Falcon Aerospace appoints Captain Ahmed Borodo as non-executive director
Summary: Falcon Aerospace appoints Captain Ahmed Borodo as non-executive director . Captain Borodo is the Chief Executive Officer of Flybird Aircraft Management Services Limited .

Title: Impact, not figures, must define Tinubu’s ₦58.18tr budget – Akpoti-Uduaghan
Summary: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu laid before the National Assembly a historic ₦58.18 trillion 2026 Appropriation Bill . The proposal is Nigeria’s largest budget proposal to date, as his administration seeks to steady the economy .

Title: U.S-based philanthropist feeds 700 families in Kwara
Summary: Ademola Stephen Gbenle gave out food items to over 700 vulnerable families in Kwara State . The Chairman of Peter and Deborah Foundation distributed relief materials, including ₦10,000 .

Title: Chaim Zach and the rise of agrited: Driving protein prosperity across Nigeria through innovative, sustainable farming solutions
Summary: Dr Chaim Zach exchanged the quiet corridors of his native Israel for the bustling markets of Lagos in 1991 . Few could have imagined the seismic ripple his vision would send through Nigeria’s agricultural mosaic . Through Agric International Technology, Dr Zach will drive protein prosperity across Nigeria .

Title: Kwara succession battle
Summary: Since Nigeria’s return to constitutional democracy in 1999, gubernatorial contests in Kwara State have been fair in terms of participation across the three senatorial districts . Each region produces aspirants and candidates .

Title: Female sweeper killed in Lagos road accident
Summary: The victim was carrying out her routine environmental sanitation duties when the tragedy occurred . Confirming the incident in a statement, the Lagos State Traffic Management Authority (LASTMA) said .

Title: Troops arrest suspected gunrunner, recover arms in Plateau
Summary: Troops have arrested a suspected gun runner at Mairana community of Mangu Local Government Area (LGA) of Plateau . Maj. Samson Zhakom said that the operation, held on Friday, followed a credible intelligence .

Title: Tambuwal to world powers: Nigeria’s insecurity is criminal, not religious
Summary: Tambuwal said bandits and armed marauders do not represent any religion . He said they are criminals driven by violence and lawlessness .

Title: President Tinubu arrives in Bauchi for condolence visit
Summary: President Bola Tinubu landed at Sir Abubakar Tafawa Balewa International Airport, Bauchi, at about 4:09 pm . He was received with a guard of honour by the Nigerian Air Force . The condolence visit is part of the President’s engagement to commiserate with the family

Title: NAF graduates 1,296 recruits
Summary: The Nigerian Air Force has graduated no fewer than 1,296 recruits at the Passing Out Parade of Basic Military Training Course 45/2025 . Title: Bus kills LAWMA sweeper, driver apprehended — LASTMA
Summary: The Lagos State Traffic Management Authority has confirmed the death of a Lagos Waste Management Authority operative in a road traffic incident along Meran Road, inward Iyana Ekoro axis, Lagos . Title: NDLEA seizes 1,396 kg of narcotics, arrests 150 suspects in Adamawa
Summary: The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency has seized 1,396.5 kg of narcotics and arrested 150 suspects in Adamawa in December . The Commander of the Agency, Mr Aliyu Abubakar, disclosed this at a news conference with the theme: “Expose a Drug Dealer Today: Save the Future of Adamawa Youth

Title: Police arrest man for shooting officers in Ondo
Summary: The Ondo State Police Command has arrested a man identified as Nwabali for allegedly shooting police officers at a checkpoint in Ipele, Owo Local Government Area of the state . The suspect was said to be among three men who carried out the attack . Two police officers and a woman sustained injuries during the incident .
